body_html:
I have sent #8761 to remove downloads from configure script. However, this means downloads will happen automatically during bazel build. Unfortunately, we have to have the dependencies downloaded to build the code, the PR just changes when they are downloaded.

Looking at your logs, I see that there is:
Tried to reconnect at offset 7,935,828 but server didn't support it.
So maybe we should remove the sourceforge mirror for swig, and get a more agreeable mirror.
body_text:
I have sent #8761 to remove downloads from configure script. However, this means downloads will happen automatically during bazel build. Unfortunately, we have to have the dependencies downloaded to build the code, the PR just changes when they are downloaded.
Looking at your logs, I see that there is:
Tried to reconnect at offset 7,935,828 but server didn't support it.
So maybe we should remove the sourceforge mirror for swig, and get a more agreeable mirror.
body:
I have sent #8761 to remove downloads from `configure` script. However, this means downloads will happen automatically during bazel build. Unfortunately, we have to have the dependencies downloaded to build the code, the PR just changes when they are downloaded.

Looking at your logs, I see that there is:
`Tried to reconnect at offset 7,935,828 but server didn't support it.`
So maybe we should remove the sourceforge mirror for swig, and get a more agreeable mirror.
